FuncDef: Use this command to define the amount by which the TWAMP Light packet will be padded. TWAMP session controller packets are 27 bytes smaller than TWAMP session reflector packets. If symmetrical packet sizes in the forward and backward direction are required, the pad size must be configured to a minimum of 27 bytes.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the value, in octets, to pad the TWAMP Light packet. Values-0 to 2000.
